constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 35 (Friday, February 25, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CARSON:
H.R. 6831.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of section 8 of Article I of the Constitution.
[Page H1147]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

title: To require the Commandant of the Coast Guard to issue regulations for amphibious passenger vessels operating in waters subject to the jurisdiction of the United States, and for other purposes.
